r.s: Engine for performing and rendering text diffs
r.d: This package provides a text-based diff engine and renderers for multiple diff output formats.
r.n: * Fix reference warnings with PHP 4.4 and PHP 5.1. * Fix too many trailing context lines for the last diff chunk. (PEAR Bug #6251). * Add diff engine for existing diffs/patches (Ã?rjan Persson, PEAR Request #5373). * Fix problems with numbers, whitespace-only changes and the inline renderer (PEAR Bug #6428.
